alert.note: Alert for North Snowy Range Foothills; South Laramie Range; South Laramie Range Foothills (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: High Wind Warning issued December 18 at 1:38PM MST until December 19 at 5:00PM MST by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 1 AM TO 5 PM MST MONDAY... * WHAT...West winds 35 to 45 mph with gusts of 65 to 70 mph possible. * WHERE...North Snowy Range Foothills, southern Laramie Range and adjacent foothills. This includes Interstate 80 between Elk Mountain and Cheyenne. * WHEN...1 AM late tonight until 5 PM MST Monday. * IMPACTS...Mainly to transportation. Strong cross winds will be hazardous to light weight and high profile vehicles, including campers and tractor trailers.
info.instruction: A High Wind Warning means a hazardous high wind event is expected or occurring. Sustained wind speeds of at least 40 mph or gusts of 58 mph or more can lead to property damage.

area.areaDesc: North Snowy Range Foothills; South Laramie Range; South Laramie Range Foothills
